channel.title: Retarded Computer!
channel.description:
Hey for some reason, I can no longer log in on my computer, only my laptop. My computer says I made need to check my cookie settings? But I haven't done any editing to the computers settings... Any help?
:L
Sorry if this is in the incorrect section, :).
EDIT: I'm using Internet Explorer.

item.title: Retarded Computer!
item.dc:creator: @frostyboy07 frostyboy07
item.description:
@frostyboy07 wrote:

[quote=“rova1, post:6, topic:376678”]recommend trying a different (and better) browser: eg google chrome or mozilla firefox

have not use internet explorer in a long time (I’m assuming this is what your using since you didn’t say) but if I remember correctly if you go to internet options from the tools menu and then on the advanced tab there will be a button labelled “reset” which will restore all options to default settings. restart it to see the effects[/quote]

Ok i’ll try that when I next use that computer.

Read full topic

item.title: Retarded Computer!
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

recommend trying a different (and better) browser: eg google chrome or mozilla firefox

have not use internet explorer in a long time (I’m assuming this is what your using since you didn’t say) but if I remember correctly if you go to internet options from the tools menu and then on the advanced tab there will be a button labelled “reset” which will restore all options to default settings. restart it to see the effects

Read full topic

item.title: Retarded Computer!
item.dc:creator: @frostyboy07 frostyboy07
item.description:
@frostyboy07 wrote:

Tried that, I changed the settings of enabled cookies to medium and tried it, as well as low, and neither worked. But they were never changed in the first place.
